attributes.action: Ask the government to talk of peace and not of war.
attributes.additional_details:
In its dealing with Iran this government's ministers are using far too much aggressive rhetoric. Please sign to keep the peace.  We don't want to follow the USA into yet another oil war.
Most families in Iran and England just want to live in peace, educate and care for their children and look after the weak in society. We don't want a world of hatred.
Ask your MP to insist on more peaceful language in parliament.
